channel.title: Airalo
channel.description: Airalo is the world’s first eSIM store for travellers to access over 100 eSIMs at the most affordable, local rates from around the world, all via eSIM compatible smartphone, tablet or PC. Airalo offers you both connectivity and freedom - you’ll never have to carry multiple SIM cards or change your number again, no matter where you are in the world.

item.g:title: Unlimited GB South Korea travel eSIM valid for 30 days
item.g:description: Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital/virtual SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM for South Korea and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity
